page.title: 07POPULATION OF THE AREA
page.content: THERE IS A WIDE VARIATION IN THE TYPES OF POPULATIONS IN THIS AREA BECAUSE OF THE MIX OF TRULY RURAL AND LARGE VILLAGE COMMUNITIES. THE TENANT FARMERS AND FARM WORKERS REPRESENT THE ESSENTIALLY SIMPLISTIC WAY OF LIFE WITH ITS RELAXED, EASY MANNER. ON THE OTHER HAND THE LARGE VILLAGE COMMUNITY OF SPRATTON MAY BE DESCRIBED AS ESSENTIALLY SUBURBAN IN MANY WAYS SINCE IT CONTAINS SEVERAL PEOPLE WHO ARE COMMITTED TO THEIR OCCUPATIONS IN NORTHAMPTON OR OTHER AREAS IN THE NEIGHBOURING TOWNS. THESE PEOPLE ARE NOT GENERALLY TRUE COUNTRY FOLK. MOST OF THE PEOPLE IN THE 30 TO 60 AGE BRACKET GENERALLY BELONG TO THE MIDDLE CLASS, WHILST THE OLDER ONES ARE MAINLY OF WORKING CLASS EXTRACTION BUT ARE OFFICIALLY CLASSIFIED AS OLD AGE PENSIONERS.THERE ARE MANY OF 80 YEARS.
